000000  sll
000010  srl
000011  sra
000100  sllv
000110  srlv
001000  jr
001100  syscall
011000  mult
011010  div
100000  add
100001  addu
100010  sub
100011  subu
100101  or
100100  and
100110  xor
100111  nor
101010  slt
